pages.text: Using $(item)star dust$(), its possible to create a $(item)star beam torch$().$(br2)While those torches are a little bit brighter than normal ones, thier real power lies in thier ability to connect to any each other in a $(thing)6 block radius$(). Pressing $(thing)shift$() while $(thing)jumping$() lets you travel between these torches.$(br)Some even call this $(thing)flow motion$()
